Hope an update on finances qualifies as child related. Just want to keep you in the loop. Please let me know if you have any questions.

From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/01/2024 at 09:37 AM)
Subject:Re: Support for the Family
Message 900 of 4024
I’m so sorry... I am so so sorry. I’m heartbroken
I wish I had known. I wish we would have addressed.
I am simply besides myself. I am so sorry, Christine
Sent:02/01/2024 at 09:40 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/01/2024 at 09:41 AM)
Subject:Re: Support for the Family
Message 901 of 4024
We all lived our own experience with individual perspectives and need to own our actions and consequences. Hopefully we all take that experience
and learning to help inform how we live our lives moving forward in a way that is aligned with values we seek to live by.
Sent:02/01/2024 at 09:41 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/01/2024 at 09:41 AM)
Subject:Re: Elsa
Message 902 of 4024
Is there any way that we can discuss in a professional setting? This is all so profound, and I would like to understand your perspective, so I am a better
father in the future. I would have liked to have understood when it was happening. But even in retrospect, it will be helpful to us all.
Sent:02/01/2024 at 09:45 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/01/2024 at 09:48 AM)
Subject:Re: Elsa
